title: sa_nagnajit-citralakṣaṇam
body:
atha bhāratīyabhāṣāyāṃ citralakṣaṇam |
prathamaḥ parivarttaḥ brahmāṇaṃ ca mahādevaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ sarasvatīm varadāṃ ca mayā natvā kriyate jayamaṃgalam // prajāpatestathā śambhoḥ padmāsyāyāstathā giram pārvatyā anusṛtyaiva jāyatāṃ kila paṇḍitāḥ //

tadanantaraṃ citralakṣaṇamucyate | maṃgalamastu |

mahādevāya devāya sarvavidyavijānate namo namo mayā samyag ucyate citralakṣaṇam // ādau candramasaṃ vande haraṃ ca candraśekharaṃ viṣṇvindrau sūryamagniṃ ca varuṇaṃ marutaṃ tathā // namaskaromyahaṃ caiva viśvakarmaprajāpatī nagnajitaṃ namaskṛtya tvācāryāṃśca punaḥ punaḥ // varṇaṃ ca citrakarmātha śāstrānusāratastathā yathājñānaṃ yathāśakti saṃkṣepeṇa mayocyate // viśvakṛnnagnajiddevaprahlādasāramujjvalam lakṣaṇamanusṛtyaica viduṣāṃ sudhiyāṃ punaḥ // saṃgṛhya mativṛddhaye nānāśāstrasamuddhṛtam ucyate citralakṣaṇaṃ śṛṇvantu tadvidā janāḥ // puredaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śrutvā nararājo mahodharaḥ dharmajñaḥ satyaniṣṭhaśca buddhimāṃśca yaśo'nvitaḥ viśruto bhayajinnāmnā tathābhūt dharaṇītale // guṇottamasya bhūpasya dhārmikasya praśāsane śatasahasravarṣāṇi cāyuḥ prajāḥ prapedire // nīrogā na ca hantāro manorogavivarjitāḥ akālamṛtyuhīnāstāḥ kutaḥ krodhāḥ kuto malāḥ // vāyuḥ supravahaścaiva śakraḥ suvarṣakastathā varṇarasasametāni vījamūlaphalāni ca // varṇāśramā hi catvāro na cyutā dharmatatparāḥ ṛddhiguṇasamāyuktaṃ śrīmad vikasitaṃ jagat // evambhūte sthite rāṣṭre sukhaśāntisamanvite bhayajito manaḥ śuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ tapasi drutam // suduṣkaraṃ tapaḥ kṛtvā rājñātiśuddhacetasā varā bahuvidhā prāptā devāllokapitāmahāt // viṣayastasya śatrubhir devāstrairapi durjayaḥ uttamāpratirodhyā ca sarvaśāstre matistvatha // sarvaguṇairupetasya parākrāntasya dhīmataḥ mahābhāgasya devānāṃ prabhāvaiḥ prāptaviśruteḥ // sarvavidyāśrayasyāsya mūrttadharmasya bodhinaḥ maṇiputrasamākhyaspa etādṛśasya bhūpateḥ // savidhe tvāgataḥ kaścid rudan vipro 'tiduḥkhitaḥ kathaṃ rodiṣi bho vipra cetyapṛcchad dvijaṃ nṛpaḥ // kruddhena tena vipreṇa kathito nṛpatistadā tava śāsanakāle 'smin deśe 'kālamṛtiyataḥ // tato 'dharmeṇa rājyaṃ taṃ śāssīdaṃ nṛpa niścitam viṣmayo ya itaḥ pūrvaṃ na jāto 'sau pravartate // madīyavaṃśarakṣākṛt lakṣaṇākṛtisundaraḥ akālamṛtyunā kasmāt kroṛato 'pahṛtaḥ sutaḥ // bramha priyau hi rājan tvaṃ sarva jānāsi bhūtale prāṇatulyaṃ sutaṃ mahyaṃ dehi svāmin kṛpānvitaḥ // dayāṃ yadi na kuryāstvaṃ śaktiman guṇavan nṛpa tṛṇakhaṇḍāṇiva prāṇān tvatsavidhe tyajāmyaham // bhāṣite tu dvijenaivaṃ buddhimān puraṣottamaḥ ākarṣaṇe sutaṃ tasya matiṃ cakre nṛpālakaḥ // sāntvitastu nṛvākyena 'āgaccha mama dāsa hi' sūryavarcodharaṃ yamam uditaṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān // dharmarājaṃ jagadbandyaṃ praṇamya bhayajinnṛpaḥ brāhmaṇasya hitārthāya sādaraṃ vākyamabravīt // pratyupakṛddvijātestu prāṇebhyo 'pi sutaḥ priyaḥ cākāle 'pahṛto yo 'sau tava dūtena durdhiyā // prabho tribhuvanasyāpi dīyatāṃ tanayaḥ priyaḥ viśvakarman dvijanmane asmai prītyā ca dhīmate // śrutvā pretādhipo vākyaṃ pūjanīyaṃ hasan nṛpam dadau pratyuttaraṃ mṛdu tejasā pūritaṃ vacaḥ // svakīyakarmavaśād jīvāḥ sarve madvaśagā dhruvam kasyāpyākarṣaṇe tyāge svecchāśaktiḥ kuto mama // sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sarvaṃ karmavaśaṃ sadā tasmāt rājan vijānīyān mayā naiva pragṛhyate // madgṛhaṃ pratipadyātha śarīrī na nivartate kālena mahatākṛṣṭo dvijaputro balīyasā // kuśalaṃ cākuśalaṃ vā sarvamihānubhūyate karmānusāriṇī bhūmir vijñeyā ca sadā nṛṇām // evamuktaḥ punarbhūpaḥ prāha vaivasvataṃ yamam matprārthanāvaśād deva dehyasmai putramuttamam // na śakyate na śakyate yama āha punaḥ punaḥ dehi dehi sutaṃ deva rājñāpi prārthitaḥ punaḥ // āgrahasyātiśayyaṃ ca tayoritthaṃ babhūva ha vyākulau tī mahāyuddhe tadā liptau babhūvatuḥ // tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti ta rājā bahuśaḥ prāha vīrahā sthito 'smīti raṇe rājan tamavocad nṛpaṃ yamaḥ // asaṃkhyānāṃ ca vāṇānāṃ tīkṣṇānāṃ parivarṣaṇam akarod bhayajid rājā yamasyopari sarvataḥ // śrutaghnaṃ sarvato divyaṃ meghato vārivarṣavat apratirodharupaṃ tad astraṃ vavarṣa dharmarāṭ // tena rājā mahākruddho mahāprabhāvaśālibhiḥ yamadūtāṃścadevāstraiḥ prapīḍya mumude bhṛśam // śūlāsiprāsamudgarā yamadūtavinirgatāḥ bhūpena sarvathā naṣṭā bhayapravartakā ime // preto dāruṇarupī ca pratidiśamadhāvata naṣṭaḥ senāpatiścaiva āgamadāhavād drutam // tataḥ pretādhipo devo dṛṣṭvā taṃ tu parājitam yathājñākāriṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ jagrāha pratihiṃsayā // kālāgnisadṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā utkṣiptaṃ pṛthivīpatiḥ brahmaśiro 'ṅkita cāstram ātmahaste gṛhītavān // sarve bhūtā bhayatrastā mahābhūto 'pi sarvataḥ babhūvurāturā sarve tena durlakṣaṇena vai // duḥkhitāṃ sakalāṃ pṛthvīṃ dṛsṭvā brahmā tathā suraiḥ ājagāma svayaṃ tatra tasmin deśe raṇākule // brahmāṇaṃ svāgata dṛṣṭvā bhayajinnṛpasattamaḥ sāñjaliḥ pūjayitvā taṃ prāha yathāyathaṃ vacaḥ // yamo 'pi praṇipatyātha sarvāmakathayat kathām vaiklavyakāraṇani ca śrutvā śeṣāṇi sṛṣṭikṛt pratyāvṛtya raṇād devaḥ kathayāmāsa tau tadā // na doṣo bhavatāṃ nātha mṛtyupatermahātmanaḥ satyanarādhipasyaiva kālasya na tu karmaṇaḥ // purā śubhāśubhaṃ karma tathā ca śiśunā kṛtam labdhañca maraṇaṃ śīghra janma prāpya ca mānuṣam // sāphalyameti te śramo brāhmaṇasyāsya pūjanāt tasminnupāyavidyeyaṃ matprasādāt prapūjyatām // varṇādīnāṃ samāyogaiḥ etaddvijasutākṛtim rupamālikha bho rājan sarvalokahitāya vaṃ // āvirbhūtena brahmaṇā itthamukte suvuddhimān jīvayituṃ lilekha taṃ dvijaputraṃ mahopatiḥ brahmā taccitramādāya yojayāmāsa jīvitam // vikacotpalacakṣuṣmān sukumāraśarīradhṛk cakṣurunmīlya sānandaṃ punarjīvanamāpede // jīvitaṃ putramāsādya hṛṣṭo brāhmaṇasattamaḥ bramhāṇamabhivandyātha svīyaputraṃ gṛhitavān // brahmābravīt tato bhūpaṃ brāhmaṇaprītaye ime yamadutā jitāḥ śaktyā sādhu sādhu kṛtaṃ tvayā // brahmāṇā kathite tvevaṃ sa rājā harṣamāptavām sarvadamanakārī tu daurmanasyaṃ yamo gataḥ // aprasannaṃ yamaṃ dṛṣṭvā vacobhirmadhurairbhṛśam brahmā svayaṃ samāśvāsya bhūpatiṃ prāha sattamaḥ // dharmanītiḥ suvijñāya na nindet kāmapi prajām sadānandapradobhavyastv abhimānaṃ ca varjayet // yatra sevā satāṃ nāsti tatra nindā bhaved dhruvam nālpamapi sukhaṃ kiñcid āpnoti nindukaḥ sadā // dveṣiṇo 'pi budhāḥ svargād bhavanti vicyutāstahā ahaṅkānarayuta bhūtaṃ tyajanti sarvamānavāḥ // nirahaṅkāriṇā tasmāt bhavitavyaṃ sadā khalu jātyā balena dānena naipuṇyena ca vidyayā // devatānāñca viprāṇāṃ viśeṣaṇa samādaraḥ prakartavyo na kartavyo nindopāyaḥ kathañcana // avirodhena satkāraḥ karaṇīyaḥ sadā nṛpaiḥ kṣamāvalambanīyā syāt nindā tyājyā tathaiva ca sarvajño nirahaṃkaro guṇine na dviṣennṛpaḥ // puruṣaṃ vacanaṃ tyājyam āghātaṃ visṛjet sadā pratyakṣaṃ prāpyate yattu sārthakyaṃ tasya cintayet // devavipravirodhināṃ kutrāpi na sukhaṃ bhavet vidhiyaṃ naiva kāryaṃ hi yamasyāpi tato nṛpa // brahmaṇetthaṃ sa bhūpālo hy upadiṣṭo dvijapriyaḥ namaskṛtya yamasvārthe kṛtavān supriyaṃ tathā // yamo 'pi prītimāpanno brahmā prasannatāṃ gataḥ aśokaṃ prītimāpede jagadetañcarācaram // atha brahmā nṛpaṃ prāha nagnaṃ pretaṃ nivāraya yamadāsaiḥ sadā viśvaṃ na pātayed bhavān khalu // balena tejasā cāpi tapasemaṃ guṇaṃ nṛpāḥ anukuryurna karttavyo 'kuśala iha bhāvini // bhavān mahāyaśasvī ca karaṇīyo mayā kṣitau nivartasva kumārgebhyas tvaṃ sadā pṛthivīpate // pretaparyāyakaṃ nagnam ajaiṣīstvaṃ yato balāt mama prasādād rājendra brāhmaṇānugrahāttathā prajāpatitulaḥ pṛthvāṃ yaśasvī tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi // vedajño vrataniṣṭhaśca tapasā śuddhamānasaḥ prajāḥ pālaya niṣpāpaḥ anumatistathā mama // asya brāhmaṇaputrasya citrasya lekhanena ca tādṛśeṇa kṣitāvādicitrāviṣkārako bhava // lokānāṃ hitasādhanāt pūjanīyo bhaviṣyasi adya prabhṛti taccitra jagadvandyaṃ bhavet sadā // pāpaghnaṃ ca manohāri protisukhapradaṃ nṛṇām maṅgalaśropradāyakaṃ rakṣoghnaṃ śatrunāśanam // tavādau lekhakakhyātiḥ mameyaṃ vacanena ca citramiti prasiddhaṃ tat sarvatraiva bhaviṣyati // brahmaṇetthaṃ vacasyukte yamo vipraśca nagnajit sarve nemuśca bhaktyā taṃ brahmāṇaṃ lokapālakam // sarveṣāṃ maṅgalaṃ kṛtvā trilokeśaḥ prajāpatiḥ sarvadevagaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ jagāma svagṛhaṃ mudā // rājātha dharmarājaṃ taṃ pūjayitvā prayantataḥ svasthānamāgato dhīmān prīṇayitvā yamaṃ tathā // athāsau brāhmaṇastuṣṭaḥ prapayau nagaraṃ drutam yasmād deśāt samāpannas tatraiva praviveśa ca // hṛṣṭo rājā samitraśca citrasaṃracanāya vai udyato 'bhūt sadaivāsau saputre prasthite dvije // sarvarūpānukūlaṃ tat mānaṃ vā kīdṛśaṃ bhavet tat praṣṭuṃ sṛṣṭikattariṃ brahmalokaṃ jagāma saḥ // kṛpayā brūhi me brahman citrasaṃlekhanakramam citrasya lakṣaṇāni me nānāvidhāni santi ca // parimāṇaṃ kimasya syāt vidhinā kīdṛśena vā utpādanīyametaddhi sāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhavān nṛpaḥ // brahmātha prāha bhūpendraṃ śṛṇu rājan samāhitaḥ atiguhyaṃ mahad vākyaṃ paramaṃ kathayāmi te // sṛṣṭerādau samāyātā vedā yajñāśca bhūpate tataḥ prajā mayā sṛṣṭā upadiṣṭāśca tā mayā // caityānāṃ karaṇāyaiva citraṃ saṃlikhyate yataḥ vedāccitraṃ prajātaṃ vai tasmād jñeyaṃ tathaiva tat // ādau saṃlikhitatvācca citramityucyate tataḥ carācarayutā vṛkṣā jaṅgamāśca yathāsthitāḥ tathā pralikhanātteṣāṃ taccitramiti kathyate // girīṇāṃ sumeruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ aṇḍajānāṃ khagādhipaḥ yathā nareṣu bhūpendras tathā citraṃ kalāsu vai // patanti sāgare nadyaḥ samudrā ratnamāśritāḥ nakṣatraiścāśritaḥ sūryo bramhā ṝṣyāśrayo yathā tathaiva citrakarmaṇi kalāḥ sarvāḥ samāśritāḥ // himālayo yathā śreṣṭho nageṣu sakaleṣu ca gaṅgā nadiṣu śreṣṭhaiva graheṣu somabhāskarau // sameṣu vainateyaśca mahendro devavṛndake tathā śreṣṭhaṃ bhaveccitraṃ sarvāsu hi kalāsu ca // nagnajid gaccha tasmāt tvaṃ viśvakarma samīpataḥ lakṣaṇavidhimānaṃ ca tubhyaṃ sa upadekṣyati // upadeśamanusṛtya brahmaṇo bhūpatistataḥ viśvakarmasamīpe tu prasanno hyagamad drutam // dṛṣṭo 'sau viśvakarmā ca rājñā namaskṛtastathā ātithyaṃ vidhivat kṛtvā rājñe so 'dadadāsanam // rājāha viśvakarman bho brahmajñayā hyupasthitaḥ citrasya lakṣaṇaṃ karma upadiśatu me prabho // vidhirvā parimāṇaṃ vā kīdṛśaṃ vā bhavettathā upadiśatu kārtsnyena rahasyaṃ saprakārakam // evamukte narendreṇa viśvakarmā mudānvitaḥ citraśilpasya śāstraṃ tu tasmai rājñe hyupādiśat // ekāgramanasā tattu śrūyatāṃ yad madbhāṣitaṃ parimāṇaṃ tathāsthānaṃ varṇopāyau yathāyatham // pradāya sarvamīśena devena padmayoninā nirdiṣṭaṃ citralakṣaṇaṃ buddhimantaḥ kṛte śṛṇu // sarvavastusamākīrṇā ākṛtīrlakṣaṇānvitāḥ lokaśraddhāspadaṃ mahyaṃ likhitvādau hyupāharat // kena mānena śobhanāḥ sthānopāyaiśca kīdṛśaiḥ brahmaṇaḥ kṛpayā labdhāḥ sarve śilpā mayā kṛtāḥ // ākāreṇedṛśenaiva prajā mayā vinirmitāḥ devaiścitraṃ vivarddhitaṃ vividhaṃ lakṣaṇānvitam // jñeyaṃ mattastvathā rājan lakṣaṇamākṛti tathā sādṛśyaṃ veśasaundaryaṃ parimāṇaṃ kalānvitaṃ // citramīdṛśaṃ saṃlekhyaṃ yatnād buddhimatā tvayā darśanīyaṃ manuṣyebhyo vidvabhyo guṇayuktebhyaḥ citrasandarśane tāvad utsāhamatiyuktebhyaḥ // munināgāsurāṇāṃ ca pretānāṃ yakṣarakṣasām gandharvāṇāṃ ca rājendra vidhivat kakṣaṇādikam likhitvā vividhaṃ samyak tubhyaṃ mayā pradaśryate // || iti nagnajiccitralakṣaṇanirdeśe nagnajayo nāma prathamaḥ parivarttaḥ ||
dvitīyaḥ parivarttaḥ yathoktaṃ brahmaṇā pūrvam ācaṣṭe bhūpatiṃ tathā likhanādividhiṃ samyak citrasya parinirmito // sthāvare jaṃgame naṣṭe pralayānte ca vai purā prādurabhūt suvarṇāṇḍaṃ tamo hatvā jalāt kila // tasmādaṇḍāt prādurabhūt lokapitāmahaḥ svayam omityekākṣaraṃ tasmād vedavidyāśca kalpanā // catasraśca prajāstāsāṃ rupasaṃjñādayastadā āyuṣā sahitasyaiva brahmaṇo jātireva ca // sthānaṃ caryā ca dharmaśca nyāyaśca prābhavan tadā evaṃ kṛte sati brahmācintayat jagato hitam // evaṃ cintayatastasya matiritthaṃ babhūva ha kathaṃ janāśca jānīyuḥ saṃjñāṃ devamahībhūjām apramādena cādaraḥ sadā teṣu kathaṃ bhavet // brahmetthaṃ cintayitvā tu viṣṇoḥ śivasya cātmanaḥ śakrasya sarvadevānāṃ parimāṇaṃ guṇaṃ tathā // savastraṃ vividhasthitam alaṃkārāstrasaṃyutaṃ manoramaṃ surupaṃ ca atyantasradṛśaṃ tathā // sasavibhaktasarvāṅgaṃ pratyaṅgaṃ ca yathāyatham miśritena ca varṇena citrākāraṃ vinirmame // vilokya tāni citrāṇi netramūlāt pramoditāḥ sādhu sādhviti saṃpūjya praśaṃśasurvidhiṃ surāḥ // ime devāḥ prasannāśca svaptākāraṃ ca lebhire adhiṣṭhānaṃ prabhāvaṃ ca kṛtavantastathā ime // prāha saptasurān brahmā astu puṇyaṃ samāśritam adya prabhṛti sarvatra yuṣmākaṃ pratimāsu ca nātra śaṅkā kṛthā naraḥ pūjayiṣyati vaḥ sadā // śūddhayā dānena vidhivat tatparāyaṇamānasaḥ manuṣyeṣu ca yo nāma bhavantaṃ pūjayiṣyati tasmai kāmasya siddhaye nairujyaṃ saṃpradāsyati // nānā prakāraduḥsvapnāt dveṣagrastebhya eva ca sarveṣā rakṣaṇa kṛtvā pāpān nāśayati dhruvam // dharmaśca sadṛśo bhāvyaḥ rakṣohānirbhaved dhruvam yaśovṛddhirbhaved viśve yuṣmākaṃ paripūjanāt // lokapūjāvyavasthāyai pratimānāṃ yathāyatham nāmādikīrtanaṃ kārya stavapūjādikaṃ tathā // pratimāṃ yāṃ pratidinaṃ puṇyātmā pūjayiṣyati tayaiva dīyate śāntis tasmai bhaktāya sarvataḥ // evaṃ vavatviti prāhur devāḥ prasannamānasāḥ svīyaveṣaiḥ svacetasā svādhiṣṭhānaṃ samāgatāḥ itthaṃ pūjābhavad viśvavāsibhiste prapūjitāḥ // parimāṇādikaṃ teṣāṃ mattaḥ śrutvā ca lakṣaṇam adya manuṣyalokeṣu pracāraya prayatnataḥ // brahmaṇaśca mayā prāptaṃ vidyottamā ca lakṣaṇam aśeṣaṃ parimāṇaṃ ca tubhyamadya pradīyate // trilokeṣu ca pūjyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dehināṃ tathā pāpahānikaraṃ bhīter nāśakam netramodakaṃ // ādyutpannañca doṣeṇa hīnaṃ nānāśrayaṃ param vijānīhi kṣitīndra tvaṃ yaśorāśivivardhakam // || citralakṣaṇe pūjotpattirnām dvitīyaḥ parivarttaḥ ||
tṛtīyaḥ parivarttaḥ
lokasya kāyamānaṃ māṃ svayambhūrupadiṣṭavān tat tathaiva pravakṣyāmi mānaṃ brūhi prajāsu ca // devarākṣasagandharva siddhanartakakinnarāḥ vidyādharāśca nāgendrāḥ piśācapretakāyikāḥ // ye bhavanti ca teṣāṃ vai bhūpatonāṃ tatastathā sarveṣāṃ prāṇijātānāṃ mānamidaṃ pravartate // paramāṇuśca vālāgraṃ likṣā yūko yavo 'ṅguliḥ aṣṭāṣṭaguṇavṛddhyā vai jñātavyamiti niścitam // paramāṇubhiraṣṭābhir ekaṃ vālāgramucyate vālāgrāṣṭau ca likṣā sā parimāṇajñakīrtitā aṣṭalikṣā bhaved yūkaḥ aṣṭayūkā yavaḥ smṛtaḥ // dvyaṅgulordvyaṅgulaṃ mānam aṅguliḥ syād yavāṣṭakam ardhāṅguliścaturyavā iti mānaṃ nigadyate // vistārasya yathaivārtha āyāmena prakāśitaḥ tathārohasamucchrāyau paryāyavācinau matau parimāṇānusareṇa varṇanoyāḥ kṣitau narāḥ // ucchrāyaśca tathāyāmo rājñāṃ nyagrodhavṛkṣavat vistṛtaścakravartināṃ tasya kramike śaṅkhasannibhau baddhaskandhau supūrṇāṃśau śobhanamaṅgamaṇḍalam // māṃsapurṇaṃ bhaved vakṣaḥ tasyāroho yathākraman āyāmaśca yathāyathaṃ cānupūrvyeṇa saṃgatā // siṃhodaravad vijñeyā kaṭirāvartitā bhavet dakṣiṇāvartino nābhiḥ gabhīrā syād yathāyatham // airāvatasamānau hi liṅgakoṣaśca sundaraḥ samantāt maṇḍalākāraḥ ābhādṛśyā bhaved dhruvam // gajaśuṇḍasamā jaṅghā anukrameṇa vistṛtā mukheṣu connatā jñeyā gulpho 'dṛśpo bhavet tathā // subaddhāṅgulisundarau kūrmavat māṃsalau tathā ardhacandraprabhāyuktā-ṅgulicakrapadāṅkitau pādapṛṣṭomṛdū syātāṃ komalau haritau smṛtau // vṛṣapucchānupūrviyau dīrghāṅguliyutau karau nakhaprabhāsamujjvalau prasāre dīrghakau yathā parimaṇḍalasampannau cakrarekhāsvalaṅkṛtau // campakadāmaśobhitaḥ marālagātasaṃyutaḥ susaṃsthānasamāpannaḥ sarvāṅgeṇa manoharaḥ // tejasvī vīryavān rājan cakravarttī sadā bhavet āyāmārohamānaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ tadudāhṛtam // dehe jaṅghopajaṅghā ca bhṛśaṃ vikaśitā bhavet suhastau caraṇau syātāṃ tathā parva ca dṛśyate // kukṣipṛṣṭe suśobhite mukhaṃ cāru manoharam śobhitau ca bhujau syātāṃ deho mānānvito bhavet // aṅgāni māṃsapūrṇāni śarīraṃ snigdhavarṇakam priyaudāryaguṇā yatra rājahaṃsagatistathā cārudeho mahīpateḥ cakravartī sa ucyate // prasiddhaiḥ śilpibhiḥ kāryaṃ mānavāṅgeṣu yatnataḥ śīrṣakaṣṭabhujadvandaṃ jaṅkhopajaṅkhasundaram // upayukteṣu sarveṣu parimāṇaṃ tu yatra ca tatra svāṅgulinā kāryaṃ mānaṃ sarvatra karmaṇi // ārohāyāmapīnatve pratyaṅgaṃ samatāṃ bhajet vidhinā parimāṇena sammpannaṃ śobhitaṃ bhavet // atī jñeyañca paṇḍitaiḥ parimāṇaṃ suyatnataḥ parimāṇapratiṣṭāno-pāyādibhirvihīnā yā pratimā sā parityaktā suradevaiḥ sadā khalu // piśācā rākṣasā bhūtā vasanti tvarita tathā śobhitān nāśayanti ca amaṅgalaṃ bhayaṃ bhavet // ārohāyāmayoḥ rājan lakṣaṇaṃ kathitaṃ mayā yathecchaṃ vai vibhaktavyaṃ caturbhāgena mukhyataḥ // valiḥ sūryo dāśarathiḥ rāmo manusutastathā parimāṇānusāreṇa kāryo bhinno vīcakṣaṇaiḥ // bhadrau dvayaṅgulinā nyūno mālavyaścaturaṅguliḥ rucako 'ṣṭāṅgulinyūnaḥ śaśakaśca daśāṅguliḥ // apriyo na yathā yāyāt tathā mānaṃ vicārayet kiṃ bhavet parimāṇena śarīraṃ cedasundaram // caturṇāṃ ca tathā rājñāṃ parimāṇasya lakṣaṇam brahmaṇā tu pradarśitaṃ vistaraṃ bravīmi te // sarvasya lekhane granthe vistāro bhavati dhruvam tena trasyanti cālpajñā aśrutikāraṇān nanu // nārīpuruṣayoḥ satsu lakṣaṇeṣu prajāpatiḥ dvādaśeṣu sahasreṣu pañcaśa upadiṣṭavān // naralakṣaṇayukteṣu tathānirdiṣṭapañcadhā tubhyaṃ pradarśayāmi ced gacched grantho viśālatām // cakravarttinarendrasya lakṣaṇaṃ kathitaṃ mayā vidhivat parimāṇañca anyapradarśanena kim uttamapuruṣādīnāṃ tena mānaṃ dhruvaṃ bhavet // ato buddhayā suniścitya bhadro lekhyo vicārayan sa ca bhavet samucchrāye ṣaḍuttaraśatāṅgulam // rucakasya samucchrāyaḥ śatasaṃkhyānvito bhavet mālavasya tathocchrāyaś catuḥśatamitāṅgulam // śaśakasya samucchrāye saṃkhyāṣṭanavatiḥ sadā aṅgulīnāṃ vidhātavyā citraśāstraviśāradaiḥ // ato 'nyomānaniyamo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati uttamādhamamadhyamapradhānānāñca bhūbhṛtām ārohāthāmamānaṃ tu ālocyātra pradarśinam // ucchrāyo navarat strīṇā jñeya ekāṅguliḥ kṛśaḥ ekāṅgulistathā rājñā puṣṭirjñeyā mahāmate // nābhijaṅkhopajaṅkhānāṃ laṭikaṇṭhopajānunām śīrṣadeśasya vakṣasas tathā caraṇayornṛpa āroho nāpriyo yāyāt tathā mānaṃ vidhīyatām // uttamamadhyamādhamamānaṃ tu kramikaṃ matam ārohaśca tathāyāmaḥ teṣāmatra pradarśitaḥ nārīṇāṃ parimāṇaṃ ca sarvaṃ śṛṇu krameṇa hi // rājñāṃ yathā pradarśitaṃ mānena ca tathāyutam samyag vicārya śemuṣyā bahusthānapratiṣṭhitam // samadvibhāgasampannaṃ niṣkuṭilaṃ sukomalam lekhyaṃ citramaninditaṃ netraprītivivarddhanaṃ // iti citralakṣaṇe parimāṇo nāmstṛtīyaḥ parivartaḥ |
yāvat brahmaṇaḥ parimāṇalekhayaḥ samāptaḥ |
